title: Apple, cranberry and pear crumble
ingredients: ['2 Gala apples, peeled, cored and cubed', '2 Comice pears, peeled, cored and cubed', '60g dried cranberries', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 1/2 tablespoons lemon juice', '65g plain flour', '110g dark brown soft sugar', '50g quick oats', '4 tablespoons ground walnuts', '115g unsalted butter']
